title: EverQuest Role-Playing Book Collection & Strategy Guides
description:
This is a collection of books and manuals for the EverQuest Role-Playing Game made by Sword & Sorcery Studios. I have also included a few of the Prima Official Strategy Guides.

These Role-Playing books are fucking amazing. I don't play DnD myself, and that's not why I love these books. There are literally hundreds of pages of official artwork & lore that I've always wanted but never knew existed. 

Don't even get me started ranting on why I never heard of these types of books until now. I would have thrown money at these guys in 2002 if I had known they were making these! 


****************************************************************************
I am still missing ONE book from my Sword & Sorcery collection! Possibly the best one, please help me out!
****************************************************************************
EverQuest Plane of Hate (Sword & Sorcery)

IF YOU CAN FIND DIGITAL COPIES OF THESE OTHER BOOKS LISTED BELOW, PLEASE EMAIL ME AT CaseyEQ@Live

EverQuest: Transformation (comic book)
EverQuest Atlas: The Maps of Myrist
EverQuest Companion: The Inside Lore of a Gameworld
EverQuest: The Ocean of Tears
EverQuest: The Blood Red Harp
EverQuest: The Rogue's Hour
EverQuest: Truth and Steel
EverQuest: The 10th Anniversary Collector's Edition
